Hi, I'm Nayka

Software Developer

Studying software development opened a set of skills that I didn't know I had and lead me to a better version of myself. Since I started this journey, the fact of being able to solve problems and the feeling of accomplishment after, is what captivated me from the tech world. I can say now, that perseverance is a quality that describe very well my Software Development journey.

I love that building software I’m able to solve problems, concretize ideas and create solutions that can affect the world positively. My passion for learning and this career work perfectly together, since the learning in Software Development never ends.

Resume

Projects

Star Wars API App

In this application I'm using SWAPI API to pull data from. This API holds information about Star Wars characters and movies. The user can access the API data by typing in the search the name of the characters and the app will filter the charachters with the information that matches the search. The data is then, displayed in a table. This Application is created using Javascript, React.js and React-Bootstrap.

Expense Tracker App

In this project I use React and React Bootsrtrap to create a simple expense tracker app, where the user can add new expenses in a table. Each expense include the payment method, date, category, name and amount.

Programming Languages & Tools

Calculator App

This is a simple calculator app, where the user can add, subtract, multiply and divide operands. The calculator also has a memmory to store values for more complex calculations. In this project I combined HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

Rock Paper Scissors App

In this project I combine HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create a rock-paper-scissors game where you play the computer.
